name: Alpine.js Support
description:
This plugin adds support for the following Alpine.js features:

  • Auto-complete alpine directives such as x-data
  • Set the language to JavaScript inside your directives so that you have full syntax highlighting and code complete
notes:
Added

  • Added support for Blade directives like @entangle() inside Alpine directives
  • Added option to disable gutter icons

Changed

Deprecated

Removed

Fixed

  • Addressed some issues where certain characters couldn't appear at the beginning or end of certain directives
  • Fixed issue where Markdown plugin was interfering with Alpine gutter icon

Security
